items.sentence: Tom let it be known with a dismissive wave of his hand that he wasn't enthusiastic about the idea.
Tom repairs old household appliances in his spare time. People now come to him from all over town.
If you can't afford an attorney, one will be appointed for you before any questioning if you wish.
It is said that Japanese people are kind to people they know, but rather cold to those they don't.
Mary is one of the prettiest girls in the whole school. Despite that, she's never had a boyfriend.
